room_title: Escape room "35th & Archer" by Immersion Escape Rooms in Charlottesville
room_address: 2125 Ivy Road Suite F Charlottesville, VA 22903
room_description:
Locus' attempt to silence your investigation has failed, but they're still on your heels. Leonard has directed you to the abandoned 35th & Archer subway maintenance station, the epicenter of Silver Lining's release. You have 60 minutes to investigate the scene, collect some items that will help you take down the Locus Secure Research Facility, and escape the city.
Use your time wisely because Locus is sure to find you soon. Will you decide to risk it and collect all the items or do you escape as quickly as possible? The choice is yours.
